mixedobjects.description: Merge objects from multiple models and output in a loop.

attributes.models: Model names(comma separated text or an array).
attributes.params: Hash array with model name as key and column name (comma separated text) as value.'models' or 'params' is required.
attributes.conditions: Hash array with model name as key and column name,condition,filter value (comma separated text) as value.
attributes.set_context: Set each object context in loop.
attributes.include_draft: If object has column 'status', Whether to include not published objects.
attributes.offset: Starts N object from the start of the list. N is a positive integer.
attributes.limit: A positive integer to limit results.
attributes.glue: When specified, the string will be placed in between each row.
attributes.include_workspaces: If object has column 'workspace_id', objects matching the given workspace_ids(Comma separated values or 'this' or 'all' or 'children').
attributes.exclude_workspaces: If object has column 'workspace_id', objects excluding the specified workspace_ids(Comma separated values).
